post.author: 윤석규
post.content:
Hello, members!
I am Paul Yoon (Korean Name: 윤석규). I like our home page very much and it didn't have any problem until I upgraded my browser. Recently I upgraded it to MS IE 6.0 (the lastest version). After that, I have got a runtime error whenever I click any link in COSKA web page. Does any of you get the same experience? If this one is not only my problem, I think it is supposed to be fixed.
Thank you.
post.title: A runtime error occurs after upgrading my browser
